# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: site code with three buttons "Menu", "Leave feedback", "Information". Stylistically designed in dark colors and using adaptive layout

Відповідь: .

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>

<head>
  <title>Feedback Site Home Page</title>
  <!-- style sheet to design page components --> 
  <style>
    body {
      font-family: arial;
      background-color: #333333;
      color: #dddddd;
    }

    .header-cont {
      width: 100%;
      position: relative;
      margin: auto;
      padding: 10px;
    }

    .content-wrapper {
      width: 100%;
      position: relative;
      margin: auto;
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
      grid-column-gap: 20px;
      padding: 20px;
    }

    button {
      border-radius: 10px;
      font-size: 15px;
      width: 200px;
      height: 35px;
      background-color: #dddddd;
      color: #333333;
      transition: background-color 500ms ease;
    }

    button:hover {
      background-color: #202020;
    }

    @media (max-width: 700px) {
      .content-wrapper {
        display: block;
      }
    }
  </style>
</head>

<body>
  <header class="header-cont">
    <h1>Feedback Site</h1>
  </header>
  <main>
    <div class="content-wrapper">
      <form method="POST" action="menu.php">
        <button type="submit">Menu</button>
      </form>
      <form method="POST" action="feedback.php">
        <button type="submit">Leave feedback</button>
      </form>
      <form method="POST" action="info.php">
        <button type="submit">Information</button>
      </form>
    </div>
  </main>
</body>

</html>
